title: Machines for Freedom takes high-quality women’s ride gear off road
content:
There’s nothing quite like slipping into a cycling kit that just fits perfectly. Aside from looking amazing, a combo of a properly fitting bib, jersey, and weather-specific accouterments bring an added boost of confidence and comfort that will help riders perform at their peak.  But in the mountain bike world, women’s apparel has tended to […]

The post Machines for Freedom takes high-quality women’s ride gear off road appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
